report.name: ppcm_listext_g

dataSource.name: Q_LISTPERSEXT_G
dataSource.select:
-- cas 1 -- ressource avec une situation en cours
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole_g, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg_g, res.rnom nom_g, res.rprenom prenom_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Intervenant forfait',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout_g, to_char(sit.ident) ident_g, sit.prestation prestation_g, sit.soccode societe_g, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu_g, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy')) fincontrat_g, to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymmdd') fin_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lcbis.lccouact,'FM999999999D00')) cout_futur_g, to_char(lcbis.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy') contrat_futur_g, st.gnom responsable_g, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g from ligne_cont lc,ligne_cont lcbis,situ_ress_full sit,ressource res,struct_info st where sit.ident=res.ident and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and l.lresdeb < sysdate ) and lcbis.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and ( l.lresfin > sysdate or l.lresfin is null)) and lcbis.ident = res.ident and lc.ident(+) =sit.ident and sit.codsg=st.codsg and res.rtype <> 'C' and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' &P_WHERE
UNION
--cas 3 --pers ayant une situation en cours sans contrat
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole_g, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg_g, res.rnom nom_g, res.rprenom prenom_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Intervenant forfait',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout_g, to_char(sit.ident) ident_g, sit.prestation prestation_g, sit.soccode societe_g, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu_g, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance_g, '' fincontrat_g, '' fin_g, '' cout_futur_g, '' contrat_futur_g, st.gnom responsable_g, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g from ressource res,situ_ress_full sit,struct_info st where sit.ident=res.ident -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' --pas de contrat and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null )) -- and sit.ident NOT IN (select l.ident from ligne_cont l) and res.rtype <> 'C' and sit.codsg=st.codsg and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' &P_WHERE
&P_ORDER_G;

textSegment.string: Date fin de contrat en cours
Fin de la situation en cours
Date de fin de contrat en cours:
